lex.text: The United States @ 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument's location is Adams County, Pennsylvania, northwest of Carroll County Maryland.
lex.template: PATIENT-1 @ AGENT-1 location is BRIDGE-1 , northwest of PATIENT-2 .
lex.tree: (SENTENCES (S (NP-SUBJ (DT[form=defined] the) (NNP United) (NNPS States)) (ADVP (JJ 11th)) (NP (NP (NNP Mississippi) (NNP Infantry) (NNP Monument) (POS 's)) (NN location)) (VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] (VB be) (NP (NP (NNP Adams) (NNP County)) (, ,) (NP (NP (NNP Pennsylvania)) (, ,) (ADVP (RB northwest) (PP (IN of) (NP (TAG PATIENT-2))))))) (. .)))

lex.text: The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is located in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, in Adams County, which has Carroll County, Maryland to its southeast.
lex.template: AGENT-1 is located in PATIENT-2 , in BRIDGE-1 , which has PATIENT-1 to AGENT-1 southeast .
lex.tree: (SENTENCES (S (NP-SUBJ (DT[form=defined] the) (JJ 11th) (NNP Mississippi) (NNP Infantry) (NNP Monument)) (VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] (VBZ is) (ADJP (JJ located) (PP (IN in) (NP (TAG PATIENT-2)))) (VB ,) (PP (IN in) (NP-OBJ (NP (TAG BRIDGE-1)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=null] (VB have) (NP (NP (TAG PATIENT-1)) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP$ (TAG AGENT-1)) (NN southeast)))))))))) (. .)))

lex.text: The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is placed in the municipality of Gettysburg, Adams County, Pennsylvania, northwest of Carroll County Maryland.
lex.template: AGENT-1 is placed in the municipality of PATIENT-2 , BRIDGE-1 , northwest of PATIENT-1 .
